notes: Open source release: project hosted on GitHub.
Automated builds: GitHub Actions builds macOS and Windows on every push.
Installer generation: macOS produces a .pkg installer; Windows produces a .zip (manual) and a .exe NSIS one-click installer.
Automated release: pushing a version tag automatically creates a GitHub Release with all platform installers attached.
Real-time Optimization: Changed Modern Limiter Lookahead buffer to pre-allocated ring buffer, eliminating dynamic memory allocation risks during parameter adjustments.
Documentation Refactor: Extracted parameter list into a separate CSV file and simplified technical documentation.
Manual Update: Improved descriptions for UI Mode and the Link System.
Refactored Advanced Panel: Full overlay view with dynamic parameter display based on Limiter Mode.
Fixed Linking System: Resolved synchronization issues with 'Reset Links' and 'Link' buttons preventing accidental unlinking.
Improved Gesture System: Enhanced distinction between user interactions and automation for better stability.
Optimized Interaction: Disabled mouse wheel value changes on the advanced panel to prevent accidental edits.
Architecture Improvements: Enhanced parameter synchronization and locking mechanisms.
Split Clipper/Limiter algorithms into independent implementation files (Soft/Hard and Classic/Modern).
Added 'clipper_mode' parameter for Clipper mode selection.
UI: Changed Clipper/Limiter modes and Oversampling to dropdown menus and moved them to the top-left of the knobs.
UI: Disabled keyboard focus triggering for dropdown menus.
Included Lookahead in system latency compensation; consistent latency for Classic/Modern.
Unified latency for Oversampling combinations and added difference alignment (including clip bypass scenarios).
Delta function: Outputs the difference processed by Clip/Limiter; drive gain is automatically compensated after Limiter; added Delta switch to the main page.
Fixed low output level issue under oversampling (unified +0.1 dB compensation).
Fixed high-frequency rolloff caused by ADAA in the Clipper linear region.
ADAA is now only enabled when knee > 0.
Moved oversampling compensation to the processing stage before Delta difference calculation.
Fixed warnings.
Added scaling function.
Added check for updates function.
Fixed check for updates getting stuck on Checking and eventually timing out: requestId overflow caused response packet matching failure.
Merged True Peak with ISP Safety: Enabling True Peak defaults to enabling post-ISP safety.
True Peak no longer forces Limiter to at least 4x: Limiter runs according to Oversampling selection; when below 4x, 4x reconstruction detection and safety limiting are appended to the output.
Migrated True Peak/ISP detection standard to oversampling domain: removed 3-point parabolic interpolation approximation.
Rewrote Web UI, adding complete visualization: Waveform, Clip/Limit GR, LUFS Short-Term history trajectory.
Added visualization settings: Ticks / Range / Speed, with persistence and automatic restoration.
Visualization continues scrolling when playback stops/pauses: reconstructed interpolation logic to eliminate stuttering and twitching.
Added In/Out knobs: Out max limited to +1 dB, default Out=-0.1 dB.
Unified plugin naming to Lim.one (consistent product name/interface text).
Forced Windows to use WebView2 backend to avoid page load failures caused by IE kernel.
Fully offline Web UI resources: recursively packaged web directory resources and extended resource provider to support arbitrary paths.
Localized fonts: Built-in Inter and JetBrains Mono (woff2/woff) to ensure complete offline styles.
Fixed macOS installer script: more robust positioning of artefacts and pkg output.
Initial version.
